info.name: DarkBox - Inbox Dark Theme --UPDATED--Sept 2018--
info.description:
**IMPORTANT NOTICE** DO NOT USE 'Stylish'

it is tracking you browsing and passing data to third parties.

REMOVE IMMEDIATELY

instead use Stylus on the Chrome store it works with 'userstyles.org'.

Inbox by Gmail reworked by DarkBox. As of September 18 DarkBox has been completely overhauled, much better contrast of colors. Comments and feed back appreciate, please be specific about any issues.

~MORE DARKBOX STYLES HERE~
Inbox Dark Theme ~ Turn Google Inbox Dark!
GMelius Dark Theme ~ Turn GMelius for Inbox Dark!
Inbox Nav Mod ~ Inbox Wide & Compact Nav Panel

Missing an extension from DarkBox? Let me know via feedback, all Feedback is welcomed!
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.00
Cleaned up the code, made changes regarding the contrasts.

Version 0.09
Changed: Changed various icons and colours to individual styling for the single item.

Version 0.08
Fixed: Reading pain font incorrectly styled.

Version 0.07
Fixed: Found the reading pane becomes disjointed when graphical emails arrive. The reading panel is now white upon viewing a email.

Version 0.06
Fixed: Some Style issues surrounding incorrect colours
Change: corrected Snooze background colouring and font colours to be inline

Version 0.05
Fixed: Search bar not changing colours correctly
Change: Added radius on :hover to search button and bar
Change: New Mail text colour changed to GREEN instead of BLUE

Version 0.04
Fixed: Change account window

Version 0.03
Fixed: Font on the compose page sometimes does not change to white
Fixed: Snooze box showing a white section & highlights are Blue
Fixed: G+ images being inverted
Change: Bordering to blue
Change: Nav highlighting blue
Snooze: Corrected to DarkBox colours

Version 0.02
Changed a few bits which were not changing under hover, new email window improvements. Returned the top bar to blue.

Version 0.01. 
Credit to Fuba - Franz Strassmayr for the base code !
